find_screen.why_license_plate: Why do we need the vehicle's license plate?
find_screen.why_license_plate_response:
Our application allows us to help each other with the aim of finding stolen/missing vehicles, one user declares having lost a vehicle and another like you, declares having found it
Entering the license plate allows us to verify that it This is indeed the vehicle in question.

find_screen.locationAccessDeniedMessage: Please grant us access in your settings?
find_screen.pushNotificationBody: Your report within the Sur4plots app has helped locate your vehicle... Check the 'Procedures' tab

find_screen.announcementNotPublishedTitle: Your ad was not published for one or more reasons
find_screen.announcementNotPublishedMessage: Either a user was faster than you, or no search request exists with this license plate
find_screen.reportReceivedMessage: You will be notified as soon as we have news. Note that you will be rewarded â‚¬7 (Seven Euros) when the owner confirms it is indeed their vehicle, you just need to send us an email to the following address: contact@sur4plots.com

vehicle_screen.importantInfoDescription:
You can check the vehicle's photo for free; if it is indeed yours, you will be invited to pay the due amount to see the vehicle's address.
After payment, the address where it was last seen will be displayed.
vehicle_screen.noRequestDescription: All the requests you make and their information will appear here.

my_finds_screen.bankDetailsRequest: Please send us your bank details along with the license plate so we can proceed with the verifications and send you your rewards
